quotes.quote: The self-sufficient Martian colony is not a dream, but a necessity. We must learn to live off the land, for Earth is a distant shore.
quotes.author: Dr. Aris Thorne

quotes.quote: To rely on Earth is to invite disaster. A single supply failure could doom us all. Independence is survival.
quotes.author: Jian Li

quotes.quote: Our connection to Earth is a lifeline, not a weakness. It is the source of our knowledge, our culture, and our humanity.
quotes.author: Dr. Lena Hanson
